name: RaceThePresentation
description:
This is a small Speed Running Game, i created for a presentation of mine. The goal is to finish the presentation in the shortest time possible. To make the game a little harder, the player gets a small movement impair when he falls from certain heights.

There sadly is no ingame scoreboard. If you achieve a better time then displayed here, leave a comment with your time or send a screenshot at tiogiras@gmail.com and i will change the current time on itch to yours.

Records

Current Record: 00:56:63 (Valle)
